name: mongo-docker
description: Dockerfile and scripts to setup a production ready Mongo container

scripts.docker:build: with-package docker image build . -t pkg.imageRepo:pkg.version && npm run docker:tag
scripts.docker:tag: with-package docker image tag pkg.imageRepo:pkg.version pkg.imageRepo:latest
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:clean && npm run docker:runHelper
scripts.docker:runHelper: with-package docker run --env-file .env --name pkg.imageName -d -p pkg.imagePort:27017 pkg.imageRepo
scripts.docker:debug: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run && sleep 1 && npm run docker:taillogs
